name: Price Matrix for WooCommerce
author: AzMarket

sections.description:
Price Matrix For WooCommerce helps to show the price of variable products become easier and more intuitive under price list.

ðŸ“Œ Free Features

1. Display table Price Matrix
Replace frontend dropdown with a price matrix table.

2. Drag & drop order of variations
On the Edit Product page you have the ability to drag and drop the variation attributes in whatever order they need to be in.

3. Quick & Easy Enter Price

ðŸ“Œ PRO Features

1. Unlimited Products
With free version, support with two attributes. But with PRO version you use unlimited.

2. Support 04 attributes
Display 4 table styles: two attributes, three attributes width direction vertical, three attributes with direction horizontal, four attributes.

3. Premium Support
Get free support and free lifetime updates at https://azmarket.net/item/price-matrix-for-woocommerce

How it works
sections.faq:
Is this plugin compatible with the latest version of WordPress and Woo-commerce?

Of course, it is. We are always tried to make regular update so that the plugin can be compatible with the latest version of WordPress and WooCommerce.
sections.changelog:
1.2.2 – 2022-03-07

  • Fixed: Undefined variable: show_tooltips
  • Fixed: Notice: register_rest_route was called incorrectly is missing the required permission_callback argument
  • Added: Remove the limit of using only three products

1.2.1 – 2020-07-31

  • Fixed: Load table
  • Added: Support special characters in value of attributes, ex: Quotation mark (24″x32″),…

1.2.0 – 2019-03-24

  • Added: Show all product enable Price Matrix at All Products page
  • Added: Support 01 attribute
  • Fixed: Remove/add row

1.0.0 – 2018-07-01

  • Released
